hardwareAbstraction
Class Drive

java.lang.Object
  hardwareAbstraction.Drive

public class Drive
extends java.lang.Object

This class handles the driving motors, it is a modified version of the TwoWheeledRobot class from Lab4.

Constructor Detail

Drive

public Drive()
Initializes the leftMotor and rightMotor from the values in Settings

Sets motor acceleration to 500, allowing for relatively smooth acceleration

Method Detail

getDisplacementAndHeading

public void getDisplacementAndHeading(double[] data)
returns displacement and heading based on tacho counts -> passed through the data array pointer

Parameters:
data - array of length 2. data[0] = displacement, data[1] = heading

setSpeeds

public void setSpeeds(double forwardSpeed,
                      double rotationalSpeed)
Sets both forward and rotational speed of the robot

Parameters:
forwardSpeed - speed to travel forward at [cm/s]
rotationalSpeed - speed to rotate at [deg/s], positive is CW

stop

public void stop()
Stops robot from moving
